name: Western Bank VR
description: Do you remember Bank Panic ? The classic arcade western from Sega in the 80's? Since we love arcade games, we created a new game called Western Bank, based on the epic gameplay of Bank Panic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: I5 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX970 or higher Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: capable sound device
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: I5 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX970 or higher Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: capable sound device
